scripts.test: lab -a code -v -L -T ./node_modules/lab-transform-typescript -c --coverage-exclude client --coverage-exclude config --coverage-exclude dist --coverage-exclude migrations --coverage-exclude models --coverage-exclude seeders
scripts.prod-start: npm install && ./node_modules/.bin/pm2 install typescript && npm run migrate && NODE_ENV=production ./node_modules/.bin/pm2 delete -s production  || : && NODE_ENV=production ./node_modules/.bin/pm2 start server.ts --name production
scripts.test-start: npm install && ./node_modules/.bin/pm2 install typescript && npm run migrate && NODE_ENV=testServer ./node_modules/.bin/pm2 delete -s testServer || : && NODE_ENV=testServer ./node_modules/.bin/pm2 start server.ts --name testServer
scripts.local-start: npm install && ./node_modules/.bin/pm2 install typescript && npm run migrate && ./node_modules/.bin/pm2 delete -s localServer || : && ./node_modules/.bin/pm2 start server.ts --name localServer
